metadata.name: MOTHÎžRHOOD
metadata.description:
Motherhood is a hymn and dedication to all mothers in the world, having the most beautiful and difficult task a human can have. Always strong and full of energy, despite lack of sleep and nerves, they fullfill their task with tenderness and enorm amount of love. 
A task so valuable, as a human live. 
That was the reason minting this tender piece, captured only few weeks after the birth of our daughter. 

Artist: Paschalis Serafeim  
Gear: Fujifilm X-T30, Fujinon 56mm  
File: 4992x3328  
Place: Baden-Baden, Germany

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, and display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
